nodes.text: Marauder Mountain was a mountain on the Forest Moon of Endor. It was named after the moon's Sanyassan Marauders.

In the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, Marauder Mountain was one of many designated planetary regions. The game, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, was shut down on December 15, 2011.
